text: Bisjore az ahli kitoʙ pas az in, ki haq ʙarojason oskor gardid, ʙa xotiri hasodate, ki dar vucudason ast, orzu dorand, ki sumoro ʙa'd az imonaton ʙa holi kufr ʙozgardonand. Pas, sumo avf kuned va [az eson] darguzared, to Alloh taolo farmoni xesro [ʙaroi cihod ʙo onon] sodir namojad. Hamono Alloh taolo ʙar har cize tavonost
